definition: to decline/to wane/to become weak or feeble

sentences.english: Conclusions Elderly patients with chronic heart failure can tolerate carvedilol treatment.
sentences.chinese: 结论老年心力衰竭患者基本可以耐受卡维地洛治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the curative effect of synergsim on headstrong heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨联合用药治疗顽固性心力衰竭的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of valsartan in the treatment of congestive heart failure(CHF).
sentences.chinese: 目的旨在探讨缬沙坦在充血性心力衰竭中的治疗作用。

sentences.english: Biventricular pacemakers were initially approved for people with severe heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 双腔起搏器最初被批准应用于严重心力衰竭的患者。

sentences.english: Lowering high blood pressure still prevents congestive heart failure and promotes kidney health.
sentences.chinese: 降低血压仍可防止充血性心力衰竭，促进肾脏健康。

sentences.english: The level of BNP was the important indicatrix of the CHF diagnose and therapeutic effect.
sentences.chinese: BNP水平是心力衰竭诊断及评级疗效的重要指标。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of Carvedilol in the treatment of chronic heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察卡维地洛治疗慢性心力衰竭患者的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the tolerance to carvedilol in elderly patients with chronic heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 目的评估卡维地洛治疗老年心力衰竭患者的耐受性。

sentences.english: They do not prove that elevated blood glucose causes heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 他们没有证明血糖升高引起心力衰竭。

sentences.english: Tarik passed away in 1994 due to congestive heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 塔里克于1994年因充血性心力衰竭而逝世。
妈妈有充血性心力衰竭。

sentences.english: People with the syndrome experience heart failure or heart attack-like symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 心碎综合症患者的症状类似于心力衰竭和心脏病。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of urapidil on the treatment of congestive heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察利喜定治疗充血性心力衰竭的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Objective to observe the therapeutic effects of Shenfu Qiangxin Decoction on systolic heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察参附强心煎治疗收缩性心力衰竭的疗效。

sentences.english: She was first diagnosed with congestive heart failure in 2004.
sentences.chinese: 早在2004年她就被诊断出患上了充血性心力衰竭。

sentences.english: Calcium sensitization is a new type of anti-heart failure drug.
sentences.chinese: 钙离子敏感药是一种新型的治疗心力衰竭的药物。

definition: atrial fibrillation (abbr. for 心房顫動|心房颤动[xin1 fang2 chan4 dong4])
abbr. for 心肌梗塞[xin1 ji1 geng3 sai1], myocardial infarction/heart attack
